title: Add OpenCode Pollinations Plugin to Dev_Tools
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: OpenCode meets the Hive
gist.blurb: We've bridged the gap between OpenCode and Pollinations. Now you can access our free and Pro AI models directly within your OpenCode environment.
gist.summary: Added the OpenCode Pollinations Plugin to the Dev_Tools registry, enabling direct access to Pollinations AI models within OpenCode.
gist.impact: Developers using OpenCode can now seamlessly utilize Pollinations' AI generation capabilities for their projects.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a bridge builder. Visualizing a connection between a code editor interface (OpenCode) and the organic Pollinations ecosystem. The bee is plugging in a connector.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot connecting a glowing lime green cable between a retro code editor window and a digital flower. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'PLUGIN'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
